name: CineWatch
description: CineWatch is a comprehensive movie and TV show streaming platform design, focusing on intuitive user experience and dynamic content display. Currently, I am actively implementing download and uploading features, and also developing a system for users to write reviews for shows.

name: Generational Ventures Foundation Website
description: A multi-page website for a non-profit organization focused on community development through sports and education. The site features dynamic content loading, responsive design, and an interactive team page.
features: Dynamic page content via JSON data
Team member profiles with details page

name: Whitewater Rafting Site
description: A multi-page website designed for a whitewater rafting company, showcasing responsive design principles and an engaging user interface. This was one of my early projects.

name: Simulation Bank App and GUI
description: A command-line and graphical user interface application simulating basic banking operations.

name: Simple C# Console App
description: A simple console application built with C# to explore object-oriented programming concepts and language syntax.

name: Digital Wellness Console App
description: A C# console application designed to promote digital wellness and mindfulness. It provides interactive activities for breathing, reflection, and listing, along with features for mood tracking and user profile management.

name: Database Management System
description: A backend project focused on managing a relational database using SQL. This project demonstrates skills in schema design, data manipulation, and complex querying for business data.

name: CineWatch Enhanced
description: An enhanced version of the CineWatch platform, featuring advanced functionality for content management, user interaction, and a more robust backend system. This project builds upon the original design with new features for a more dynamic and interactive user experience.
features: Integrated User Review and Rating System

name: La Familia Chambers
description: A multi-page website for a Chamber of Commerce, featuring sections for members, news, awards, and advertising services. The site is designed to be fully responsive and uses dynamic content loaded from JSON files.
features: Dynamic content loading from JSON files

name: iMarket Kenya
description: An online e-commerce marketplace for the Kenyan market, with a focus on Mlolongo. The site features dynamic product listings, multi-vendor support, and category-based browsing for various goods, leveraging a modern responsive design.
features: Dynamic content loading for products and vendors

name: iMarket Kenya Online Marketplace
description: An online e-commerce marketplace for the Kenyan market, with a focus on Mlolongo. The site features dynamic product listings, multi-vendor support, and category-based browsing for various goods, leveraging a modern responsive design.
features: Dynamic content loading for products and vendors
